articles.title: Ancient-human fossils sent to space: researchers slam 'publicity stunt' - Nature.com
articles.description: The decision to send hominin bones on a commercial spaceflight has raised eyebrows among palaeontologists.

articles.author: Science X
articles.title: New Saturn images show a change of seasons and a last glimpse of its huge, warm polar vortex - Phys.org
articles.description: While the UK has been experiencing warm autumnal weather, a team of planetary scientists has found that Saturn's late northern summer is experiencing a cooling trend, as huge planetary-scale flows of air have reversed direction as autumn approaches.

articles.title: Apple forced to ditch lightning charger in new iPhone - BBC
articles.description: Apple confirms new iPhone 15 will have a common USB-C charging port after EU forces it into the change.
articles.content:
Apple has confirmed its new iPhone will not feature its proprietary lightning charging port, after the EU forced the change.
